Author: dpapathanasiou
Content:
It's great to get a glimpse of how it works, but I was a little surprised to see how bulky the backpack machine is.

Could the justin setup eveolve to use something like the Gumstix "Way Smalls" computers -- http://www.gumstix.com/waysmalls.html -- instead?\n

Author: majikwidget
Content: You can go to http://www.majikwidget.com and use those. The absolute best way is to build your own however.
